Entities.Name: LVEF Mention
Entities.Definition: References to left ventricular ejection fraction within the text, including various synonyms and abbreviations like 'EF'.
Entities.Sample Data: "left ventricular ejection fraction", "VISUAL ESTIMATE OF LVEF", "EF"

Entities.Name: LVEF Quantitative Value
Entities.Definition: The numeric value representing the ejection fraction, often expressed as a percentage.

Entities.Name: LVEF Qualitative Assessment
Entities.Definition: Descriptive assessments of ejection fraction such as normal or decreased.

Entities.Name: LVSF Mention
Entities.Definition: References to left ventricular systolic function, a related cardiovascular measurement.

Dataset.Name: TUCP EF Year 3 Corpus
Dataset.Details: Consists of 3060 clinical notes, including 1140 echocardiography reports, from various VA Health Care sites, with a focus on LVEF and LVSF mentions and assessments.

Annotation Guidelines.Link: No external link provided; the guidelines are detailed within the document itself, which describes the annotation schema used to capture LVEF and LVSF information from clinical texts.
